name: GoApps
tagline: Apps & products development for iOS & Android
description:
Lightning fast, bulletproof yet sophisticated mobile apps?
Well, it’s possible — all you need is a flexible team of highly skilled professionals working in-house, fully focused your project.
Doesn’t matter if you’re interested in creating a new app from scratch, development based on provided designs, maintenance of existing app or outsourcing services — we can help you at every stage of development.
Our strengths:
100% in-house team of all specializations — from designers to developers and testers
taking care of the full process from idea to putting the app into stores
ability to deliver MVP in one week
providing consulting services for each step of the process
agile approach — working in sprints
we use all of your favorite tools like JIRA, Jenkins, GitLab, slack, Trello and more!
Contact us to get a free quote!
